ygData.subject: site crawl problem
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I create a crawl job, it starts to run without any errors, but it finishes successfully in about 30  seconds. It doesn t crawl the site

Hi,

I create a crawl job, it starts to run without any errors, but it 
finishes successfully in about 30  seconds. It doesn't crawl the site 
(http://www.archive.org 
<http://localhost:8080/heritrix/logs.jsp?job=20060916172045593&log=crawl.log&mode=regexpr&regexpr=%5E%5B%5E%20%5D.*www.archive.org&grep=true>) 
i provide, just downloads about  171b of data and that's all. The same 
resullt with other sites i tried to crawl. I can't figure out what the 
reason of it. I use the default job profile, heritrix 1.11, on windows 
xp, tomcat 5.x. Maybe somebody have an idea?
